#ABCI one sentence summary

= abci =

|| [https://code.google.com/p/fittest/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fsub-projects%2Flogtools%2Fabci%2Fv1%253Fstate%253Dclosed src] || [https://googledrive.com/host/0BwFaBuXA-b2vaXVEdU54ZV9zUEE/docs/abci/index.html doc] || download ||

Abci is an instrumentation tool to inject low-level logging code into a target application. The application is in !ActionScript bytecode, packaged as a Flash .swf file.
